Package org.apache.drill.exec.rpc

Class AbstractDisposableUserClientConnection

java.lang.Object
org.apache.drill.exec.rpc.AbstractDisposableUserClientConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserClientConnection
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseWebUserConnection
public abstract class AbstractDisposableUserClientConnection extends Object implements UserClientConnection
Helps to run a query and await on the results. All the inheriting sub-class manages the session/connection state and submits query with respect to that state. The subclass instance lifetime is per query lifetime and is not re-used.
